user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user}, '%')
board_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
board_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')

select * from board where board_idx=#{ board_idx }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_title, board_register_date, board_modify_date, board_content, board_sort, user_id) VALUES ( #{board_title}, NOW(), NOW(), #{board_content}, #{board_sort}, 'admin');
mapper.update: update board set board_title = #{ board_title }, board_content = #{ board_content }, board_register_date = NOW(), board_modify_date = NOW() where board_idx = #{ board_idx }
mapper.delete: delete from board where board_idx = #{ board_idx }
